short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows developers and testers to record test cases actions over GeneXus applications and run them back using selenium.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UI testing of Web Apps on GXtest v4 is now available using native genexus programing, by using a specific object in GeneXus IDE: the UI Test object 

This object (test case) is a special GeneXus Procedure with the ability of controlling the browser, by using different commands like: opening the browser, clicking or typing over different controls, checking text on panels and values over controls (variables/ attributes), etc. 

GXtest recorder enable developers and testers to have a easy way to record and playback different test case commands using a Chrome extension.
